divs: sighting detailsi had my eyes on the skies in london tonight and i noticed a couple of strange objects. the first one you see i thought was a star but it was the only one visible in the night sky which i thought was unusual. the second is an object floating across the city which then seems to fade away. because tonight was a no-fly in london because of the volcanic ash from iceland my first though was this should\could not be a plane or helicopter. it did seem to move at a very steady rate and faded out very quick. to help give you some idea where the object was above i live in canada water\rotherhithe just and i was looking north\north east. i guess the object would have been moving east to west. the first object i seen would have been in the west\north west. here is a video of the event: http:\\vimeo.com\10992716
Summary: Sphere object seen flying over London
